sentences.en: Bertha was devoutly grateful to Miss Ley for her opportune return on Gerald's last night.
sentences.cn: 伯莎万分感激莱伊小姐在杰拉德的那最后一夜里适时赶回家.

sentences.en: I believe that I have arrived at a very opportune moment.
I waited, hoping for an opportune moment to discuss the possibility of a raise.
sentences.cn: 我等待着，希望会有一个合适的时机讨论加薪的事。

sentences.en: In effect, both sought to keep the possibility open until the opportune moment.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 双方都努力不把门关死,以等待合适的时机.

sentences.en: Market conditions have not been this opportune for 16 years.
sentences.cn: 市场状况在16年来首次出现这种巧合.

sentences.en: Opportune and successful strategy transformation is absolutely indispensable for every enterprise.
sentences.cn: 及时和成功的战略转型已经成为企业持续发展的必经之路.

sentences.en: Still you have to choose a moment opportune for such enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 但你还得选你赏鉴的时辰.

sentences.en: The call came at an opportune moment for me.
sentences.cn: 这个电话对我来说来得正是时候.

sentences.en: The invention of the guillotine was opportune to this mood.
sentences.cn: 断头台的发明恰好适合这种气氛.

sentences.en: The law reforms were opportune and important.
The moment seemed opportune to turn the heat on him.
sentences.cn: 看来这是对他施加压力的最适当时机.

sentences.en: The offer could not have come at a more opportune moment.
sentences.cn: 那个建议提得正是时候。

sentences.en: The opportune arrival of the bus cut short the boring conversation.
sentences.cn: 恰好出现的公共汽车打断了这无聊的谈话.

sentences.en: The place was not very opportune for her grief.
sentences.cn: 那地方是不大适合她伤心流泪的.

sentences.en: We must pick an opportune moment to wipe out the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们要选择适当时机消灭敌人.

sentences.en: When the opportune chance come, he would catch hold of them.
sentences.cn: 待适当的机会来临, 他就能抓住.

words.tran_cn: 机会主义者；投机取巧者
适当的；恰好的；合时宜的

trans.tran_cn: （时间）合适的，恰好的，及时的，适时的
trans.tran_en: done at a very suitable time
